data.message: Security hardening: Post-execution output redaction + critical path deny list: Added post-execution output scanning (closes args-clean-output-leaks gap) with redaction to [REDACTED:hash]. Added critical path deny list (Windows/Program Files/etc) that blocks even with approval - only breakglass can override.
